Class ServiceResourceRequestFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.transport.http.ServiceResourceRequestFilter

    RequestFilter, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    public class ServiceResourceRequestFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestFilter, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Serves service resources such as ?wsdl, ?xsd, and .wadl for GET queries

        public boolean doFilter(org.apache.http.nio.protocol.HttpAsyncExchange trigger,
               org.apache.http.protocol.HttpContext context,
               Message message)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: RequestFilter
        Filter an ESB HTTP request before Proxy Service processing begins
        Specified by:
        doFilter in interface RequestFilter
        Parameters:
        trigger - the response trigger to use, to send a synchronous response back to the client
        context - the HTTP context
        message - the message created within the ESB
        Returns:
        true to continue to next filter; else terminate processing of request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on failure

        Parameters:
        inputStream - InputStream of message payload

        Returns:
